memberdef.name: LONG_STRING
memberdef.initializer: = "This is a test string for NVS storage."

briefdescription.para: Comprehensive NVS (Non-Volatile Storage) testing suite for ESP32-C6 DevKit-M-1 (noexcept)

detaileddescription.para: This test suite provides full coverage of the EspNvs class, testing all methods, error conditions, edge cases, and boundary conditions. The tests are designed to run without exceptions and without RTTI.
